title: Chapter 2439 - Chapter 2439 Danger, The Divine Ancestor Arrives
body:
Chapter 2439 - Chapter 2439 Danger, The Divine Ancestor Arrives

Chapter 2439 Danger, the divine ancestor arrives

Translator: 549690339 |

“This aura…”

Lu Ming’s heart trembled violently and his pupils contracted rapidly.

He had felt this aura before.

The statue on the void God Island was emitting this kind of aura. It was Supreme and suppressed the world.

It was the aura of someone of the same level. It was the aura of a Supreme expert.

Because of the prison-guarding formation, there was a layer of black fog outside the prison-guarding field. It was impossible to see through the prisonguarding field from the outside and from the inside of the prison-guarding field, one could not see the outside.

But now, under the pressure of the aura, the black mist outside the prison suppression field dispersed.

One could see that there was a light screen between the sky and the earth that covered the entire area.

It was the light shield formed by the prison suppression formation.

Outside the light barrier, countless foreign races stood in the air or on the ground. There were so many of them that it was impossible to count.

Suddenly, the space outside split open, and a figure stepped out of the spatial crack.

However, the figure was shrouded in a layer of black light, and its appearance could not be seen clearly. However, the Supreme aura was emanating from this figure.

The moment he appeared, the aura became even more terrifying.

It was as if he was this world, he was everything, and the heavenly Dao had to grovel at his feet.

“Greetings, sacred ancestor!”

All of the alien races were very respectful.

“Holy ancestor?”

Everyone in the prison suppression field was shocked.

“Divine ancestor, the non-human divine ancestor has awakened!”

A white-haired elder from the prison suppression field said with a trembling voice. His eyes were full of fear.

This was an extremely powerful existence, but he was filled with fear when he saw that figure.

He was not the only one. Many of the great beings from the prison realm were the same.

The non-human divine ancestor was a Supreme Master, on the same level as the prison-guarding old ancestor.

That kind of person was too powerful. He had transcended the heavenly path and the heavenly Emperor realm. He had completely reached another level of life.

Heavenly Emperor-level existences were vulnerable in his hands.

Now, the divine ancestor of the non-human race had actually awakened and descended.

“The clan of purgatory shall be destroyed!”

The non-human divine ancestor said coldly, his voice filled with Supreme might.

BOOM!

The non-human divine ancestor took a step forward, and the entire sky shook violently. A huge foot formed in the sky and stomped down on the prison suppression field.

It was so big that it covered the sky. It was even bigger than the entire prison suppression field.

From a distance, one could see that there was a dome-shaped light shield around the prison suppression field.

An incomparably huge foot, which was even bigger than the light shield, stomped heavily on the light shield.

BOOM!

An earth-shaking explosion was heard. The entire prison suppression field was shaking and many buildings collapsed.

The light shield formed by the prison-guarding stele was also shaking crazily, sending out layers of waves.

However, he managed to block it in the end. This kick didn’t break the prison suppression formation. The prison suppression formation stabilized.

“Hahaha, it’s blocked, it’s blocked!”

“He can’t break it!”

The people from the prison suppression field were shocked at first, and then they were overjoyed.

The prison-suppressing formation formed by the prison-suppressing stele had actually blocked the non-human divine ancestor’s attack.

“Hmph, let’s see how many moves this broken formation can block!”

A destructive light shot out from his glabella and turned into nine huge swords that slashed at the prison suppression formation.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

Terrifying explosions kept sounding. The entire prison suppression field was like a small boat in the ocean, being hit by the waves and swaying with them, as if it could be destroyed at any time.

The eight sub-steles in the prison suppression field shook and shone with infinite light.

At the center of the prison suppression field, the broken piece of the main stele was also shining with infinite light, strengthening the prison suppression formation.

However, the non-human divine ancestor’s attack was too powerful. The terrifying power made many weaker cultivators cough up blood and fall to the ground.

BOOM! BOOM!

The mountains were shaken and exploded, sending rocks and dust flying everywhere.

“Not good, if this continues, I’m afraid we won’t be able to hold on for long!” the divine ancestor of the non-human race was also severely injured. After so many years, he’s still far from his peak. Otherwise, the prison-suppressing formation wouldn’t have been able to stop him!

“If all the prison-guarding steles are gathered, maybe we can stop it!”

Many of the great beings from the prison suppression field were anxious.

After all, the non-human divine ancestor was a Supreme Master, on the same level as the prison guard patriarch.

Although the non-human divine ancestor had been injured and lost his peak combat power, the prison-suppressing formation was only formed by the treasures left behind by the prison-suppressing great ancestor. He wasn’t the one controlling it, so there was a huge difference in power.

Furthermore, it was only an incomplete formation. How could it block the attack of the non-human divine ancestor? it would be broken sooner or later.

Now, they were caught in a dilemma.

If Lu Ming returned the prison-suppressing stele, the power of the prisonsuppressing formation would definitely surge. However, Saint ancestor bloodheart would probably be revived.

If he didn’t return the prison guarding stele, he wouldn’t be able to hold on and would die.

Lu Ming’s brows furrowed deeply.

He was also considering whether he should control the prison-guarding steles and gather them to strengthen the power of the prison-guarding formation.

However, in that case, without the suppression of the prison-suppressing stele, the third bloodline would definitely take the opportunity to devour Lu Ming’s consciousness.

The situation was extremely dangerous.

“What do we do?”

Everyone was extremely anxious.

Roar!

At this moment, a Dragon’s Roar rang out between heaven and earth.

The Dragon roar shook the heavens and earth as a Supreme pressure filled the air.

Hualala!

In the distance, the void trembled violently and cracked open. A Dragon Claw suddenly stretched out from the void.

This Dragon Claw was too big and boundless. It grabbed towards countless foreign kinds and enveloped them.

At this moment, countless outsiders, including the Kings of the ten royal families, were all terrified. They felt as if they were going to be turned into ashes by this claw.

“It’s you, you little worm!”

The non-human divine ancestor roared in anger. He waved his hand and a huge palm struck out, clashing with the Dragon Claw.

BOOM!

A terrifying explosion erupted, and the sky within a radius of millions of miles exploded, creating countless spatial cracks.

The same thing happened to the ground below. It kept exploding, and lava rushed into the sky.

Terrifying, this was too terrifying!

Just a single exchange of moves was enough to destroy the heavens and earth.

If it weren’t for the protection of their divine ancestor, a large number of them would have died.

Roar!

a dragon roar shook the sky, and space exploded as an enormous true dragon appeared in the air.

This true dragon was too huge, at least a million miles long. It circled in the sky, covering the sky and the sun.

Countless people were dumbfounded.

ancestral Dragon! It’s senior ancestral Dragon!

Qing Cang cried out in surprise.

it’s senior ancestral Dragon. Senior ancestral Dragon is here. We’re saved!

The great beings from the prison suppression field also laughed.
